channel.description: Recent content in Outputs on Reading the Holy Land

item.title: Academic Communications
item.description: José María Andrés Porras, “Presentation of the database of the ISF-funded Project ‘Reception of the Accounts of the Holy Land (12th-13th centuries),’” Minerva-Gentner Symposium, Bar-Ilan University, December 2022.

item.title: Publications
item.description: Jonathan Rubin, “Notes on the Development and Reception of a Medieval Account of the Holy Land: Burchard of Mount Sion’s Descriptio Terre Sancte as a Test Case,” in New Directions in Latin Travel Literature [forthcoming in a volume to be published by De Gruyter in a series titled Das Mittelalter: Beihefte]
